project.name: J-C089D-LUCE-04-ST03-DT02-DF05-CF15-01
project.description: This test creates a connection to the PGSQL database, and creates a query string based on data in an environment variable. This data is not checked for special elements, however, and it is possible to construct a query string that performs unexpected data retrievals or modifications.

iopair.name: J-C089D-LUCE-04-ST03-DT02-DF05-CF15-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: index a single file Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="shipper1" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfe ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfs ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

iopair.name: J-C089D-LUCE-04-ST03-DT02-DF05-CF15-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: search files using fuzzy searching Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="shipper1" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-10 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="BadShipper'), ('80', 'BadShipper2" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_an2VVIOLJqs4b33JPL1y AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_kPUEnBfpGF OR db_sql_output_zYok8IAjJe OR database_insert_check_TjFn3Mv6MQ) AND NOT timeout_ufTR3CfVOc) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_kPUEnBfpGF OR db_sql_output_zYok8IAjJe OR database_insert_check_TjFn3Mv6MQ) OR timeout_ufTR3CfVOc OR controlled_exit_e5LbvwTQAG)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_kPUEnBfpGF OR db_sql_output_zYok8IAjJe OR database_insert_check_TjFn3Mv6MQ) AND NOT timeout_ufTR3CfVOc) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_kPUEnBfpGF OR db_sql_output_zYok8IAjJe OR database_insert_check_TjFn3Mv6MQ) OR timeout_ufTR3CfVOc OR controlled_exit_e5LbvwTQAG))

output_checks.simple_check: export PGPASSWORD=$DBPGPASSWORD; if `psql -U $DBPGUSER -h $DBPGHOST -d $SS_DBPGDATABASE -c "select * from shippers;" | grep -q "BadShipper2\|ShipAttack"`; then true; else false; fi;

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="ShippersRUs'), ('55', 'BadShips'), ('65', 'ShipAttack'), ('45', 'MultiShip" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

(NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_uwYjI0hHRl OR db_sql_output_pPLU9Aaw1F OR database_insert_check_DlwDa9YJGI) AND NOT timeout_aCYFMtfwCg) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_uwYjI0hHRl OR db_sql_output_pPLU9Aaw1F OR database_insert_check_DlwDa9YJGI) OR timeout_aCYFMtfwCg OR controlled_exit_HJwQWRuSZd))
